revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Pace |model=HR44 |revision=-700 |asin= |fcc_date=11/29/2012 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Wistron NeWeb |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=now |type=satellite TV receiver, digital video recorder |fcc_id=PGRHR44 |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=4 |pwr_conn=DIN |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model= |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1= |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model= |ram1_num=4 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, eSATA, |expansion_usb_num=1 |expansion_sata_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Wistron NeWeb DNUB-D38 |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43238 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |flags=HDMI out, A/V out, Component out |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=A8:54:B2 |oui_eth=14:D4:FE }} {{TagLine|HR44 Advanced Whole Room DVR}} :This device appears to be used with [http://part68.org/tteDetails.aspx?id=94754 ''DirecTV'']
The device appears to be fully ''[[Broadcom]]'' based. :The satellite receivers appear to be BCM4505/BCM4506es.
The FCC test report also indicates that the device has a 802.15.4 radio. :The main board has a MAC label w/ a 14:D4:FE (''[[Pace]] plc'') OUI on it. The wireless module has a MAC label w/ a A8:54:B2 (''[[Wistron NeWeb]]'') OUI on it.
Are just different manufacturers: *-100 Technicolor (Thomson/Audiovox/RCA) *-200 Samsung *-300 Philips *-400 Hughes *-500 Humax *-600 LG *-700 Pace *-800 NEC
===See also=== *[[DirecTV Genie DVR (HR54-500)]] • [[Broadcom]] BCM7346 *[[DirecTV Genie Air (HS17-100)]] • [[Broadcom]] BCM7366
